[CHARACTER_NUM] 1;
[FirstName]               Nikk;

[FirstNameNew]               Nikki;
[LastNameNew]               Kitti;
[CharType]               computer;
[Gender]               female;
[Desc]               <pink>Nikk is a tough girl in almost every sense, having lead a rough life growing up parentless in the slums of a nearby city.  She's twenty five years old and towers above most of the audience at six foot three.  Her head, and all other visible parts of her body, are shaved entirely clean.  Although a bit lanky, she's mean and lean and sports some small but well toned muscles. Some of her limbs are adorned with scars and almost everywhere else she's covered in tattoos.  She takes one long look at you.  Her stare conveys all its needs to.  It says she's not about to take shit from anyone no matter how tough they think themselves, man or woman, words or fists.  Despite all this, she actually is fairly handsome and does exhibit an amount of flirtiness that leaves you wondering if maybe the soft and friendly part of her soul repressed inside the tough exterior.</pink>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>Nikk, now known as Nikki Kitti, prances around the studio excitedly in her orange and white anthropomorphic human / feline body.  Sometimes she trots around on all fours with astounding ease and dexterity while at other times she walks upright like a normal human.  She meows and purrs ceaselessly, excited and happy to be around so many lovely people.  She's amazingly attractive, still wearing her pink hello kitty t-shirt and blue schoolgirl shirt.  You have no doubt that she will get all the love and attention she seems to have always silently yearned for inside--all the love and attention she deserves.  She singles you out and pounces on you, knocking you to the floor and meowing demandingly.  Maybe you will be the one to take her home, groom her fur and treat her to a nice warm saucer of milk...</pink>;

[Desire]               50;

[short]               tough-girl attitude with catlike quirks;
[tgShade]            mind 50;
[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               Nikk looks disinterested and begins to lick her $ARMS$ with her tongue.  She doesn't even seem to mind or care about everyone staring at her.;
[status]               Nikk is occasionally grooming herself with her tongue, seemingly oblivious to the abnormality of such a behavior for a human.;
[short]               catlike attitude;
[tgShade]            mind 66;
[STAGE] 5;
[tf]               Oblivious to the environment around her, Nikk leaves her podium and begins to wander around the studio, trotting around quadrupedally on her $HANDS$ and $FEET$.  She makes her way over to you, sniffing your feet and meowing.  Only slowly does she realize what she's doing and scampers back, her cheeks a bright crimson against her $FACE$ in embarrassment.;
[status]               At times Nikk seems entirely disinterested in the gameshow, leaving her podium to explore the studio, meowing and sniffing at peoples' legs and feet.;
[short]               very catlike attitude;
[tgShade]            mind 83;
[STAGE] 6;
[tf]               Fully apathetic to this silly gameshow, Nikk trots over to you on all fours, both her $HANDS$ and $FEET$.  Purring, she rubs her $HAIR$ against your legs and bats at your fingers playfully.  Some of the staff have to drag her back to her podium in order for the game to continue, but Nikk already seems more catlike than human in a mental regard.  At least she seems quite pleased, based on all the purring.;

[STAGE] 2;
[tf]               Nikk mutters, running her fingers through her hair as it grows out from a boyish half inch to a tomboyish yet feminine two inches long.  She stares at it in a mirror for a moment before roughing it up in her $HANDS$ in defiance.;

[short]               two-inch curly orange hair;
[tgShade]            hair 40;
[STAGE] 3;
[tf]               Rather suddenly, Nikk's curly orange hair cascades down to the base of her neck.  She seems to be a natural redhead!  Nikk tries to tie it back into a ponytail, but preferring to be bald a clean shaven, she doesn't know or remember how.  Her efforts fail and she becomes resigned to its unkemptness.;
[status]               Amazingly, Nikk sports a flow of curly orange hair that reaches down to the back of her neck.  It appears uncombed and unkempt.;
[short]               neck-length curly orange hair;
[tgShade]            hair 60;
[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               Just as Nikk seems to have managed to tie her hair back, a sudden growth leaves her $HANDS$ buried underneath a waterfall of fire-kissed red hair that reaches midway down her back.  Nikk sighs, muttering something about how she wishes she'd brought her pocketknife in today to hack it all off.  That, or at least a hairbrush.;
[status]               Nikk's tangled, unkempt orange hair reaches down to her mid back.  She tries to tease some of the tangles out with her bare $HANDS$ but ultimately only succeeds in yanking it.;
[short]               long, umkempt red hair;
[tgShade]            hair 80;
[STAGE] 5;
[tf]               Conveniently, Nikk's tangled, cascading orange hair begins to straighten itself as if some invisible hair brush were taming it.  When this is done, she is left with long but orderly orange hair that reaches down to her mid back.  Nikk seems split on whether to mess her hair up again to dispel this 'well-groomed' new look but ends up leaving it alone.;
[status]               Nikk has long, orange hair that reaches down to her mid back.  It is no longer tangled and umkempt but straightened and groomed, though many curls still remain.;

[SHIRT];

[status]               Nikk is wearing a tight black t-shirt.  It is covered with images of screaming skulls, mutilated bodies, zombies, and pretty much any kind of goth imagery imaginable.  However, it does have a fairly low-cut v-neck, so it's not entirely meant to horrify others but also seduce them a bit.  She wears a push-up bra underneath in an effort to show off her $BREASTS$.;

[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               The color scheme on Nikk's black t-shirt suddenly shift, the color scheme turning from white against plack to red against pink.  Nikk seemed personally offended--pink really isn't her kind of color, but it's either remove her shirt and expose her $BREASTS$ or keep it on.  She grudgingly does the latter.;
[status]               Rather out of character with his tough girl act, Nikk is wearing a pink t-shirt with a red skull on the front, kind of like the thing a mother would allow her 12-year-old daughter to wear due to it being adorable punk.  It totally lacks the statement and complexity of the original design.;

[STAGE] 5;
[tf]               The very last remnants of anything punk or rebelliousness evaporate as the cartoonish image of a skull on Nikk's pink t-shirt turns into a Hello Kitty face deformed by the bulge of her $BREASTS$.  Not only that, bit little frills and ribbons now line the edges of the garment.  Nikk looks like she wants to cry blasphemy at this horrible atrocity on her body.;
